parameters: Rubbles.
There does not seem to be anything useful here.
That's it, I'm going to do it no matter what people
says! If there's indeed a treasure there, then I can
use it to pay for my Mom's medication.
And even if there isn't any treasure, well I can just
go home and continue taking care of my mom. there's
nothing that I will lose just simply by going there.
I'm finally inside the ruins, and it's not as bad as
people said. The air is kinda moist here so I assume
there might be a still water.
There are a lot of doors but I have no idea how to
open it. Of course no treasure owner is going to let
their treasures be taken that easily, that just made
this entire thing more interesting!
Looks like there's a keyhole on the door so I assume
the key might be hidden somewhere. I just need to look
for it then right?
You tried to open the door...
There's a hole in the wall.
Nothing particularly interesting about it.
I don't know where I am right now. It's so dark here.
I lost my diary but thank god I brought a spare book.
There's a monster here and I don't know where to go.
No one told me about this. I know my journey here is
dangerous but this is outside of my expectation.
I just want to change my life for the better. I just
want to see my Mom to be healthy, Is that too much?
If anyone ever found this book, that means I don't
have the physical matter anymore to grab this book.
Please tell my mom that her son ran away from home
to find a better job.
Signed
- Adam McMurthy
Actor1
Kevin:
Adam McMurthy...
He was a good guy. I don't know him personally but
people always say good things about him.
Do you know how disgusting his corpse here is? I can't
believe that it's even the same person.
And you know what the worst part is? I searched this
place from top to bottom and guess what?
There are no treasures at all.
Actor1
Kevin:
Whoever told him that there was a treasure here clearly
wants to get rid of him.
If I remember correctly, he found out about the mayor's
corruption in the town that he lived in.
But since he don't know how to prove the Mayor guilty,
he only share what he knows to people close to him.
But information spreads like a wildfire, and someone
devised a plan to get rid of him.
Actor1
Kevin:
A fake traveller claiming to have found a
treasure in this ruins.
Not exactly right, someone fabricated a letter claiming
to be the king of some old empire or something.
In the letter he would say things like putting his
inheritance in this ruins. That's basically it.
For someone that struggles financially, of course
he would take the bait. Manipulating people is easy
right?
Actor1
Kevin:
You sure knows a lot about this. So what
happened to the Mayor?
You already know the answer.
This world is harsh, people with immense power will
easily get rid of those who stands in their way. Even
if what they're doing is morally wrong.
Nobody dares to face them and instead turn a blind eye
to it. I mean no one wants to disappear right?
Actor1
Kevin:
Stop it.
Anyway just touch the crystal OK? take my lesson with
a grain of salt.
Actor1
Kevin:
I like how self conscious you are.
I might be powerful, but don't put me on the same
pedestal as those kind of people.
It sickens me too you know? Enough talking now touch
that crystal.
